start_permission.label: required create permission
start_permission.tooltip: required permission type (minimum) to create a character

start_permission_info.label: create permission info
start_permission_info.tooltip:
extra info, eg: 10 (for Min_Hours) or: Rank1 (for Min_Rank)
leave empty for most types

update_interval.label: game interval
update_interval.tooltip: time in between checks for stream online

max_votes.label: max votes each
max_votes.tooltip: maximum of different votes per person

add_me.label: add /me before messages
add_me.tooltip: on twitch, this shows the messages in the color from the chatbot

follow_redeem.label: follower redeem amount
follow_redeem.tooltip: amount a follower can redeem daily

sub_redeem.label: subscriber redeem amount
sub_redeem.tooltip: amount a subscriber can redeem daily

others_message.value: {0}, follow to get daily {1} or sub for {2}!
others_message.label: message for non-follower redeem
others_message.tooltip:
message that will be displayed when non follower tries to redeem
{0} = username
{1} = follower amount
{2} = sub amount

results_title.label: overlay results title
results_title.tooltip: line that will be shown as first line of game results files

scoreboard_title.label: overlay scoreboard title
scoreboard_title.tooltip: line that will be shown as first line of scoreboard files

batch_redeem_msg.label: batch redeem response
batch_redeem_msg.tooltip:
response for succesfull redeem
users will be append after batching

currently_no_bet_msg.label: currently no betting msg
currently_no_bet_msg.tooltip:
when a player cannot bet currentlye
{0} = username

not_enough_points_msg.value: {0} you don't have so many points!
not_enough_points_msg.label: not enough points message
not_enough_points_msg.tooltip:
failed bet due to not enough points
{0} = username

already_betted.value: {0}, you already placed a bet on that place for this game (#{1})
already_betted.label: already betted msg
already_betted.tooltip:
failed bet due to already better on that place
{0} = username
{1} = current game number

batch_bet_msg.label: batch succesfull bet msg
batch_bet_msg.tooltip: batch response for betting, player names will be appended after batching

processing_game.label: processing game msg
processing_game.tooltip:
Points are distributed asynchronous.
This message needs to make that clear

already_redeemed.label: already redeemed msg
already_redeemed.tooltip:
failed redeem due to multiple attempts in 1 session.
{0} = username

offline_redeem.value: {0}, you can only redeem when the streamer is online
offline_redeem.label: offline redeem attempt msg
offline_redeem.tooltip:
failed redeem due streamer offline.
{0} = username

end_betting.value: betting for game #{0} has closed. please wait until it ends for the results
end_betting.label: stop betting msg

start_betting.value: viewers can now bet on game #{0} using !bet place amount
start_betting.label: start betting msg

max_bet_limit_msg.value: {0}, you can have a maximum of up to {1} votes
max_bet_limit_msg.label: max bet limit msg
max_bet_limit_msg.tooltip:
!bet fail response on too many votes
{0} = username
{1} = max number of votes

restart_session.label: start new session
restart_session.tooltip:
this will make so that everyone can redeem again.
Normally this happens automatically when stream is offline for 30 minutes

open_folder.label: open overlay folder
open_folder.tooltip: here you find the files you can use as an overlay

reset.label: Reset Database - Press 5 times in 5s
reset.tooltip:
the whole game will be reset, only data files are kept
 all scores will vanish!
